SageOfGerudo_PyramidLiftConsole_01: Two more left, Link! Let's hurry.
SageOfGerudo_PyramidLiftConsole_02: OK! Only one more battery to go!
SageOfGerudo_PyramidLiftConsole_00:
So this is one of the batteries... It
seems to have absorbed my lightning
well enough.
All right, three left!
SageOfGerudo_PyramidLiftConsole_03:
All right! We've charged all of the
batteries with lightning.<sp:0:4:0>That should wake up the mechanism
in the center. Let's go, Link!
